To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Identity _identity;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_identity = Identity(symbol, resolution);

// In OnData()
if (_identity.IsReady)
{
    var current = _identity.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.identity = self.Identity(symbol, resolution)

# In OnData()
if self.identity.IsReady:
    current = self.identity.Current.Value
